name: WKWindowFeatures
desc: Display-related attributes that a webpage requests for its window.

items.name: var allowsResizing: NSNumber?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to make the containing window window resizable.

items.name: var height: NSNumber?
items.desc: The requested height of the containing window.

items.name: var width: NSNumber?
items.desc: The requested width of the containing window.

items.name: var x: NSNumber?
items.desc: The requested x-coordinate of the containing window.

items.name: var y: NSNumber?
items.desc: The requested y-coordinate of the containing window.

items.name: var menuBarVisibility: NSNumber?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the webpage requests a visible menu bar.

items.name: var statusBarVisibility: NSNumber?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the webpage requested a visible status bar.

items.name: var toolbarsVisibility: NSNumber?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the webpage requested a visible toolbar.
